DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of lung aeration during weaning from mechanical ventilation determined by electrical impedance tomography and lung ultrasound
DOC.brief_title: Lung Aeration During WEANing From Mechanical Ventilation Determined by Electrical Impedance Tomography and Lung Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective clinical study in ICU with patients during weaning from mechanical ventilation comparing lung aeration determined by electrical impedance tomography and lung ultrasound. Duration of weaning test is 60 minutes.
DOC.criteria: Adult ICU patients during weaning test from mechanical ventilation Consent of patients or family Arterial line Tracheotomized patients Dressings in the thoracic area
